name: Namkeen Chicken Boti Zubaida Tariq in Handi Recipe | Zubaida Tariq | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Namkeen Chicken Boti Zubaida Tariq in Handi Recipe: Chicken Boneless ½ kg Lemons 3 White vinegar ½ cup Oil ½ cup Crushed black pepper 1 tsp Ginger powder 1 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: In a pan, add in boneless chicken, wash it. Add in some salt and ½ cup white vinegar. When the water dries, add in 1 tbsp ginger powder, 1 tsp crushed black pepper Add lemon juice and ½ cup oil. Serve namkeen chicken with nan.
